successes.title: Space Case 1 - The World's Most Advanced Smart Suitcase
successes.description: Fingerprint Opening, Global Tracker, Lift-less Self Weighing Scale, Speakerphone and Power Bank all combined in a super smart luggage

Pledges.description: Thank you for helping us get featured and your support! You'll be among the first to hear about any and all developments with Space Case 1.

1- REMOVABLE 15,000 mAh POWER BANK.
This power bank will fit both carry-on and check-in just in case you need extra juice for your trip or you simply want to carry more power on the side.

CUSTOM SIGNATURE NAMEPLATE
Make your Space Case 1 unique with your very own engraved nameplate embedded into the suitcase. Reward is good for one case.

SUPER EARLY BIRD! 
CARRY-ON - POLISHED FINISH
Pre-order one airline regulation Space Case 1 carry-on featuring revolutionary Fingerprint Opening, Global Tracker, Lift-less Self Weighing Scale, Speakerphone and Power Bank all combined in a super smart suitcase
Colors: Polished Black, Polished Silver, Polished Pink
Retail: $600
